name: Wake Up and Save the World
name_original: Wake Up and Save the World
description:
"Wake Up and Save the World" is a ZZT adventure world in the style of mid-90s

ZZT worlds like "Code Red", "Coolness", and other games in which an everyday
teenager wakes up, and has a grand adventure to save the world. Although the
audience of ZZT games is now far older than the early-teen protagonists of these
titles, I think you can understand the appeal ZZTers had as early-teens in
these sort of power fantasy games that were loosely base on real world settings.

In "Wake Up and Save the World" (henceforth referred to as WUASTW), you play as
Tim, living in the Pacific Northwest and trying to figure out how to alleviate
his boredom and have some fun this weekend. As you'll soon see, he gets way more
than he bargained for!
